# [Interview #690: Twitter: Brandonothology collection, Entry #5](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=690#5)

#### Alphashard

It is difficult to think of questions that don't deal with the plot! Will there be romance in
*The Way of Kings*
?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes. Two of them, actually.
